scripts.docker:shell: docker-compose up -d && docker-compose exec node-server bash || docker-compose stop
scripts.docker:db:export: docker-compose up -d wp-db && docker-compose exec wp-db /apps/db_exporter/db_export.sh
scripts.docker:db:import: docker-compose up -d wp-db && docker-compose exec wp-db /apps/db_exporter/db_import.sh
